Posts.Content: Jul 25, 2010 02:12AM Scottea wrote: GO FOR IT GIRL!  Compression gear, chute, plane, jump and scream/laugh.  My lymph only really plays up on long flights - like to and from the U.S.  I have found ways it won't stop me from living a full/fool life you can too.  This proves it.  Jump for joy.
